page.title: Custom Mobile Development in Days | indays.app
page.description: We make the difference to your business, transforming your ideas into success through custom mobile development
page.keywords: custom mobile development, accelerated custom mobile development, obile development in days

headline.title: We help Startups and Enterprises achieve their goals faster.
headline.subtitle: Our accelerated mobile development methodology enables us to delivery custom excellent apps in days.
paragraphs: Our team, leaded by people with years of mobile application development experience, provides the best software development experience through a strong and solid culture of excellence and true agility which added to our philosophy and methodology can help your business delivering small, medium and big custom mobile applications with a minimal time-to-market.

cards.first: we transform your ideas into success by developing custom solutions that makes all difference to your business, faster
cards.second: we more than a mobile software house... our business is to co-create your own business in a collaborative way
cards.third: your customers are ours as well, so we hard work to provide the best experience to them
cards.fourth: our true agile culture helps reach goals in much less time in a healthy way

appeal.title: Time is money üí∏

appeal.description: We are ready to validate your ideas and develop your mobile application from scratch or speed up your running project using all our knowledge about app development for smartphones (hybrid or native) and smart TVs.

howWeWork.title: How we work?
paragraphs: We follow some customer-centered development strategies based in Agile Culture which aims to delivery excellent solutions generating value to their business.
To speed up the development process, we have premade code blocks and design components that were built to be consistent, useful, generic and customizable.
Take a look at this brief summary of how our agile development process works:

squad.description: All solutions developed by us are made by squads: high performance multidisciplinary teams focused on continuous delivery of true value, working in a collaborative environment with our partners (this is how we face our customers) using some Scrum and Shape Up framework fundamentals cherishing for quality and adaptability.
squad.caption: Average squad size

footer.action: Download our presentation with all information about how we work.

processTimeline.title: 1. Understand
processTimeline.description: The process starts by ensuring that all of your strategic goals will be met discussing all details about the needed solution in an in-house or remote Lean Inception workshop.

processTimeline.title: 2. Design
processTimeline.description: After gathering all required information, we start to design the solution using a prototyping tool (like Figma) to validate our partner‚Äôs ideas and goals, furthermore, all design created in this step is useful for the squad in the next steps.

processTimeline.title: 3. Develop
processTimeline.description: When any design fragment of the solution is validated by the partner, we start to code it keeping in mind that our goal is to delivery true value with excellence. To achieve this, we follow our coding standards that ensure the solution is growing up healthy.

processTimeline.title: 4. Improve
processTimeline.description: The ‚Äúdesign ‚Üí develop‚Äù steps are being repeated while the application is growing up until it is done.

items.title: Custom mobile development
items.description: We develop beautiful mobile applications for Android and iOS using their native stack or through a cross-platform technology like React Native or Flutter.

items.title: Custom Super Apps development
items.description: We have the knowledge and experience to develop this singular kind of mobile application that is a new trending after the successful campaign made by WeChat.

items.title: Custom Smart TV applications development
items.description: We develop professional applications for any TV operational system like LG WebOS or Tizen TV.

items.title: Custom e-commerce development
items.description: Our truly passion and specialty is to develop custom e-commerce platforms from the scratch or using Magento Commerce.

items.title: Custom mobile back-end development
items.description: We develop fast, reliable and secure back-end solutions using modern tech stacks like Bun.js, Deno.js or Go, or using more consolidated tech stacks like Java, Python or PHP.

items.title: Product design
items.description: We know how to create beautiful, useful and engaging mobile applications.

footer.title: About Simbiose Ventures and indays.app
paragraphs: Simbiose is a unique outsourcing company that trains developers with high technical and ethical standards. They have been in the technology market since 2012 and have already served more than 80 national and international companies.
indays.app is formed by a group of developers from Simbiose Ventures with a special focus to develop mobile solutions.
